title: LoL launcher starts to download game, then crashed and then starts all over again
body: Someone on my discord reccomended i played LoL, so i installed it, but the launcher downloads some of the game then crashes, when i reopen it it is back a 0% and says it is applying patches and it deletes all the files that had previously downloaded then started to download the game again. please help, i have attempted to install the game more than 5 times already.

replies.body:
Wow what a start, really sorry you're dealing with these technical issues at the very beginning of your League journey =(. 

What exactly happens when the installer crashes? Depending on what errors or lack of errors you see will change how I try to fix this. You can start by making sure your pc has all of the right permissions using this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), but definitely let me know if it helps or not!
